description: A crewneck sweatshirt made of 100% Regenerative Organic Certification Pilot Cotton from farms working toward the highest organic standard, which aims to rehabilitate soil, respect animal welfare and improve the lives of farmers. Because healthy soil traps carbon, this growing movement could help stop climate change. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.
name: Patagonia Regenerative Organic Pilot Cotton Crewneck Sweatshirt - Mens
